mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_user(name, age, born_date, head_img) VALUES(#{name}, #{age}, #{bornDate}, #{headImg})
mapper.update: UPDATE t_user SET name=#{name}, age=#{age}, born_date=#{bornDate}, head_img=#{headImg} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, age, born_date, head_img FROM t_user WHERE id=#{id}
